title: Prices of Justin and Hailey Bieber's wedding bands revealed
text:
Justin and Hailey Bieber kept their wedding bands relatively cheap compared to the rest of their blinged-out jewelry, as its revealed the bride's two 18-carat gold bands each cost less than a total of $5,300.

The couple tied the knot at South Carolina's Montage Palemetto Bluffs on Monday and then revealed a stunning image of Justin and Hailey at their wedding photobooth showing off all their blinged-out jewelry.

In total, the jewelry was worth more than $750,000, but their Tiffany wedding bands came nowhere near that cost.

Frugal: Justin and Hailey Bieber kept their wedding bands relatively cheap compared to the rest of their blingy jewelry

Gorgeous: Hailey matched her $500,000 engagement ring with two 18-carat Tiffany diamond wedding bands, valued together at $5,275. Justin's Tiffany band was $950

In the photobooth image, Hailey, 22, dazzled in a white halter top dress with her blonde hair placed up in a loose bun.

Justin and Hailey's wedding bling costs $500,000 Tiffany engagement ring $100,000 Audemars Piguet watch $25,000 Lavender grillz $123,000 Diamond earrings $5,275 Two 18-carat Tiffany gold wedding bands with diamonds for her $950 18-carat Tiffany gold wedding band for him TOTAL: $754,225

She then showed her wedding finger to the camera, which showed her two new wedding bands added to the finger along with her large engagement ring.

The two wedding bands were made by Tiffany & Co with 18-carat gold.

One band is thin with diamonds strewn across the entire surface and valued at $3,125, while another wedding band jolts out in a wave pattern and is also scattered with diamonds on the surface. This band is valued at $2,150.

Hailey's bands were added accessories to compliment her $500,000 Tiffany engagement ring.

Justin, 25, showed off a 18-carat Tiffany gold wedding band valued at $950.

These added wedding bands were valued at significantly less than the rest of the jewels featured in the picture of the newly married (for the second time) couple.

Not sparing any expense: But that wasn't the only piece of jewelry for the Sorry singer, rocking his Israeli diamond $25,000 lavender grillz

Sparkler: Justin showcased his new accessory on social media last week and it is estimated to be worth $25,000, according to TMZ

Dazzling: Hailey could not resist displaying her stunning jewels in the photobooth

Hailey wore Tiffany diamond earrings made up of five carats of diamonds and costing $123,000 in total.

Then besides Justin's wedding band, the singer rocked his Israeli diamond $25,000 lavender grillz across his bottom teeth. He first showcased the grillz last week on social media, with the value of them first estimated by TMZ.

The singer also accessorized with his new $100,000 Audemars Piguet watch that he splurged on just days before the big day. 'Got myself a lil wedding gift,' he captioned at the time.

After their wedding nuptials, the couple shared a series of pictures of themselves together in their reception photobooth.

Hailey shared the pictures on her Instagram and captioned the series with a simple red heart.

Justin, on the other hand, wrote: 'Looking forward to forever with you @haileybieber.'

Personal gift: The singer also accessorized with his new $50,000 Audemars Piguet watch that he splurged on just days before the big day

Besties: Guests included Kendall Jenner (pictured with the bride) and R&B singer Usher

Family event: As well as Kendall was more of the Jenner clan in her sister Kylie, her niece Stormi, mom Kris and Corey Gamble

The nuptials kicked off on Monday at a chapel in front of a group of celebrity guests, including Kendall Jenner, Kylie Jenner, Scooter Braun, Joan Smalls, Usher, and Kris Jenner.

Following the nuptial was then a reception at a nearby ballroom.

Although the festivities continued into the early hours, the couple threw a farewell brunch on Tuesday morning at Buffalo's — a southern comfort food restaurant in the hotel grounds.

The brunch, which cost $95-a-head, included a choice of bottomless mimosas or bloody marys. All of the guests stayed at the Montage Palmetto Bluffs; a five-star hotel that says it offers 'upmarket accommodation in a plantation style resort'.
description: Hailey, 22, and Justin, 25, were showing off their eye-popping bling in a series of striking black and white snaps taken in the photobooth at their reception.
